item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour announced for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/nintendo-switch-2-welcome-tour-announced-for-switch-2

  • Switch 2

Paid title due out at launch.

Nintendo has announced Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour, a paid digital-only game for Switch 2 due out alongside the hardware on June 5.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo:

Explore a variety of features and details the new system has to offer. Players can enter a virtual exhibition with Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour and gain insights into what makes Nintendo Switch 2 such a unique gaming experience. Through tech demos, minigames, and other interactions, players will get to know the new system inside and out in ways they may never have known about otherwise.

item.title: Donkey Kong Bananza announced for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/donkey-kong-bananza-announced-for-switch-2

  • Switch 2

Due out on July 17.

Nintendo has announced Donkey Kong Bananza for Switch 2. It will launch on July 17 for $69.99. In Japan, the physical edition will cost 8,980 yen and the digital edition will cost 7,980 yen.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo:

Get ready for Donkey Kong Bananza, a brand-new 3D platforming action adventure—vailable exclusively on Nintendo Switch 2. Crash, bash, and climb through nearly everything in DK’s path and tear off chunks of terrain to swing around and throw in groundbreaking exploration. The more that is demolished with powerful punches, the more areas open up to discover. Break on through this adventure full of mayhem, surprises and bananas when Donkey Kong Bananza crashes onto Nintendo Switch 2.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery. Visit the official website here: English, Japanese.

item.title: Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade coming to Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/final-fantasy-vii-remake-intergrade-coming-to-switch-2

  • Switch 2

Release date not announced.

Square Enix will release Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade for Switch 2, the company announced. A release date was not announced.

Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade is an enhanced version of Final Fantasy VII Remake. It first launched for PlayStation 5 on June 10, 2021, followed by PC via Epic Games Store on December 16, 2021, and PC via Steam on June 17, 2022. It is the predecessor to Final Fantasy VII Rebirth, which is currently available for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

Here is an overview of the game, via Square Enix:

In Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade, players follow the story of ex-SOLDIER operative turned mercenary, Cloud Strife, as he lends his aid to the underground resistance group Avalanche in the mako-powered city of Midgar. In the fight against the shadowy Shinra Electric Power Company, Cloud and his comrades are thrust into a larger conflict to determine the fate of the planet. Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade also includes an exhilarating original story arc, Final Fantasy VII Remake Episode INTERmission, which brings Wutai ninja Yuffie Kisaragi to the forefront as she infiltrates the city of Midgar during the events of the base game.

With over seven million copies shipped and sold digitally worldwide on the PlayStation and PC platforms, this upcoming release marks the series’ debut on a Nintendo system, giving a new audience of players a chance to experience 2020’s The Game Awards RPG of the Year* for the first time ever.
